info.title: About Pools
info.whatArePoolsBody: Pools let you collect Bitcoin payments, and know who's constributed toward a shared goal. Create a pool, set a target amount, and share it with anyone you like.
info.howStep1: • Set up a new pool with a name and goal amount
info.howStep2: • Share the pool link so others can find it
info.howStep3: • Contributors send Bitcoin directly to the pool
info.howStep4: • Close the pool when ready to move funds to your wallet

index.seedPopup: A recovery phrase is a list of words that lets you recover your Bitcoin if your device is lost or damaged. Write it down and store it safely. Never give it to anyone—if someone gets it, they can take all your money.

about.licenseBody: Blitz is free and open source software licensed under the
about.walletDescription: This is a self-custodial Bitcoin Spark wallet compatible with the Lightning Network. Blitz does not have access to your funds, if you lose your recovery phrase it may result in a loss of funds.
about.sparkDescription: Blitz is powered by the Spark protocol. Spark is an off-chain protocol where Spark Operators update the state of Bitcoin ownership off-chain, allowing for fast, low-fee, and non-custodial transfers without touching the blockchain.

displayOptions.cameraSwipeDesc: Swipe right on any main screen to open the camera.
displayOptions.text6: Please reconnect to the internet to switch your denomination
displayOptions.text12: Swipe right from the main screen—whether you're on Contacts, Wallet, or the Home page—to quickly open the camera for scanning.

fastPay.text1: Error adding input value. Please try again.
fastPay.text5: Fast pay allows you to instantly pay invoices below a specified threshold without needing to swipe for confirmation.

loginSecurity.invalidPinconfirmation: PINs do not match. Try again!
loginSecurity.randomPinKeyboardInfo: Enable this feature to shuffle the keypad numbers every time you log in. It adds an extra layer of security by making it harder for anyone nearby to learn your PIN pattern.

seedPhrase.header: Keep this recovery phrase in a secure and safe place
seedPhrase.headerDesc: Do not share it with anyone!
seedPhrase.qrWarning:

Scanning your recovery phrase is convenient but be sure you're using a secure and trusted device. This helps keep your wallet safe.

warning.point1_accounts: Your secret recovery phrase is like a master key to your wallet.
warning.point2_accounts: If someone gets it, they can steal your funds. There's no way to recover lost funds.
warning.point3_accounts: Never share it with anyone—no person, website, or app.
warning.point1_settings: Your secret recovery phrase is like a master key to your wallet.
warning.point2_settings: If someone gets it, they can steal your funds. There's no way to recover lost funds.
warning.point3_settings: Never share it with anyone—no person, website, or app.
warning.checkbox: I understand that sharing my recovery phrase could result in permanent loss of funds.

crashReporting.descriptionText:
Crash data helps us improve the stability and performance of our application.

When a crash occurs, the device information that is automatically recorded includes:

• Operating System: OS version, device orientation, and jailbreak status
• Device Details: Model, orientation, and available RAM
• Crash Information: Date of the crash and the app version

resetWallet.dataDeleteHeader: Select data to delete from this device.
resetWallet.dataDeleteDesc: This will delete all wallet data from your device. If you don’t have a copy of your recovery phrase saved, you WILL lose access to your funds.
resetWallet.seedAndPinOpt: Delete all data from my device
resetWallet.localStorageError: Unable to delete locally stored information
resetWallet.secureStorageError: Unable to delete securely stored information
resetWallet.boxNotChecked: Please check the box to confirm you want to delete your wallet before deleating.
resetWallet.title: Delete Wallet
resetWallet.warningText: I understand that I can only recover my funds with my recovery phrase, and if I lose it, my funds cannot be recovered.

sparkLrc20.balanceError: Your current wallet balance is {{balance}}. Blitz adds a {{fee}} fee to all BTKN payments. Make sure you have some Bitcoin in your wallet to send tokens.
sparkLrc20.title: Spark Settings
sparkLrc20.sliderDesc:
BTKN is Spark’s native token. Enabling BTKN allows you to send and receive tokens on the Spark network.

Blitz is a Bitcoin-focused wallet. We do not promote or endorse the use of tokens. This feature exists because we believe users should have the freedom to use the technology they want to use.
sparkLrc20.selectTokenInformationPopup: Choose which token you’d like to use first when sending payments. Don’t worry—you can still change it on the payment page anytime.

viewRoostockSwaps.noSwapsMessage: You have no saved Roostock transfers

viewAllLiquidSwaps.balanceError: Current Liquid balance is {{balance}} but the minimum transfer amount is {{swapAmount}}
viewAllLiquidSwaps.swapMessage:
Blitz Wallet will try to transfer your Liquid funds into Spark when you first load the app or when you receive Liquid payments.

However, in some cases a transfer might be missed. To move these funds into Spark manually, just click the Transfer button below.
viewAllLiquidSwaps.autoClaimHelper: Automatically swap Liquid funds to Lightning when the minimum threshold is reached.

notifications.mainToggleDesc: Notifications let you stay informed about important events and updates happening in the app.

feeInformation.description:
Blitz Wallet provides free and open-source tools for the Bitcoin community.

To support the long-term sustainability of the project, a small transaction fee will be applied to each payment.

The breakdown of fees is below.

hasNoAccounts.wanringMessage:
To send money from your Nostr Connect account, you’ll first need to add funds—either by receiving money or transferring from your main account.

 You can transfer funds from your main account to NWC in the account settings page.

noNotifications.wanringMessage:
In order to use Nostr Wallet Connect you need to have push notifications for Nostr Wallet Connect enabled.

Please enable push notifications in the settings and try again.

showSeedPage.wanringMessage:
To keep your account safe, Nostr Wallet Connect creates a separate recovery phrase from your main account's recovery phrase.

You can access this recovery phrase in the accounts settings page.

combinedOnboarding.accountFundingMessage:
To send money from your Nostr Connect account, you'll first need to add funds—either by receiving money or transferring from your main account.

You can transfer funds from your main account to NWC in the account settings page.
combinedOnboarding.securityMessage: Nostr Wallet Connect creates a seperate account from your main account for added security. This recovery phrase is securely stored and can be viewed later in the Accounts setting page if needed.

receiveBtcPage.onchainFeeMessage:
Payments received to Bitcoin addresses have a network fee and a 0.1% Spark fee.

If you send money to yourself, you'll pay the network fee twice — once to send it and once to claim it.

If someone else sends you money, you'll only pay the network fee once to claim it.
receiveBtcPage.liquidFeeMessage:
Payments received to Liquid addresses need to be transferred into Spark.

This process includes a lockup fee of about {{fee}}, a claim fee of around {{claimFee}}, and a 0.1% service fee from Boltz based on the amount you're sending.
receiveBtcPage.rootstockFeeMessage:
Payments received to Rootstock addresses need to be transferred into Spark.

This process includes a lockup fee of about {{fee}}, and a 0.1% service fee from Boltz based on the amount you're sending.
receiveBtcPage.lightningConvertMessage:
Receiving dollars from Lightning requires converting Bitcoin to USD. A {{convertFee}}% fee applies, and the current exchange rate is:
{{satExchangeRate}}.

giftsHome.title: Blitz Gifts
giftsHome.desc: Share Bitcoin or Dollars with friends and family

giftsOverview.noGiftsDesc: Create your first gift to share Bitcoin or Dollars with friends and family

createGift.noAmountError: Please enter an amount to create your gift.
createGift.connectError: We couldn’t set up your gift wallet. Please try again.
createGift.addressError: We couldn’t get the address for your gift wallet.
createGift.saveError: We couldn’t save your gift. Please try again.
createGift.fundError: We couldn’t add funds to your gift.
createGift.disclaimer: When you create a gift, the money stays locked for {{numDays}} days. If no one claims it by then, you can go to the reclaim page to get it back.

giftConfirmation.whatToDo: Share this gift with anyone using the QR code or link below

claimHome.desc: Paste the gift link you received or scan the QR code to claim your gift
claimHome.noGiftLinkError: We couldn’t find a gift link. Please scan or paste the link you received.
claimHome.invliadGiftFormat: Invalid gift link. Please copy the full link and try again.

reclaimPage.desc: Enter or choose the gift ID to return an unclaimed, expired gift to your wallet.
reclaimPage.noReclaimsMessage: You have no expired gifts right now. Come back after a gift has expired to reclaim it.

advancedMode.infoDesc1: Blitz gifts use separate wallets created from your main wallet. This lets you recover unclaimed funds while keeping your main wallet protected.
advancedMode.infoDesc2: Most expired gifts can be reclaimed on the regular reclaim page. If a gift wasn’t fully received or the normal reclaim option doesn’t work, you can use this page to select a specific gift and check if any money is still left.
advancedMode.invalidGiftNum: Please enter a valid gift number between 1 and {{currentGiftIndex}}
advancedMode.advancedWarning: This advanced feature should only be used when the standard reclaim process doesn't work. If you're unsure, try the normal reclaim page first.

swapsPage.slippageDesc: Slippage is the percentage of price movement you are willing to accept. Lower slippage may cause transaction failures, while higher slippage may result in receiving a fewer amount than expected.

home.title: Savings
home.disclaimer: Cash balances are held in USDB, a dollar-backed stablecoin issued by Brale and fully backed 1:1 by US Treasury Bills and cash equivalents held at regulated financial institutions. Yield is generated through Flashnet and is variable, not guaranteed, and may be zero. USDB is not FDIC insured. Not a bank product.

goalEmoji.title: Pick an emoji that fits your goal
goalEmoji.subtitle: What defines your goal the most?

goalSuccess.title: Your goal is now set for {{amount}}
goalSuccess.subtitle: Start adding money to reach your goal.

updateGoal.title: Update goal
updateGoal.body: You can either change how much you've set aside for your goal or remove it.

removeGoalConfirm.title: Remove goal
removeGoalConfirm.warningProgressLost: You will no longer see progress toward your {{goalName}} goal.
removeGoalConfirm.warningMoneyReturned: Any money dedicated to this goal will automatically be transferred to Savings.

withdraw.balanceTypeTitle: What would you like to withdraw?
withdraw.interestBelowMinHint: Below swap minimum, bitcoin balance only
withdraw.balanceLoadError: Unable to load wallet. Go back and try again.

howItWorks.subtext: A USD-backed stablecoin that automatically accrues rewards while you hold it.

features.earnBody: USDB accrues savings rewards automatically. No staking, no lock-ups — just hold and earn.
features.accessBody: Withdraw to your Lightning wallet in seconds, any time. Your funds are never locked.
features.backedBody: Every USDB is backed 1:1 by USD held in segregated, audited reserve accounts.
features.goalBody: Track progress toward a goal — a vacation, an emergency fund, anything you choose.

howItWorks.transparencyBody: Reserves are held in segregated, audited accounts — primarily short-duration US Treasury instruments and money-market funds. Flashnet publishes monthly attestation reports.
howItWorks.disclaimer: Rates are variable and subject to change. Not a bank deposit. See flashnet.xyz for full disclosures.
